definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: The ribbed aluminium panels on the plinth form a light-coloured band that wraps around the building.
sentences.chinese: 底座上肋骨狀的鋁面板形成了環繞建築的淺色帶。

sentences.english: An outdoor game in which the players drive wooden balls through a series of wickets using long-handled mallets.
sentences.chinese: 一種遊戲選手通過一系列環繞來打擊一個木頭球。

sentences.english: Surrounded by guardsoul the little guy can perish the old guy thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 被守護魄環繞着的小傢伙能徹底毀滅老傢伙。

sentences.english: The convention is that a strip's first triangle defines its winding.
sentences.chinese: 按慣例，由三角形帶中的第一個三角形定義其環繞。

sentences.english: Sounds, like singing birds, meowing cats, buzzing bees, beeping horns, musical instruments, ringing bells, and much more, are all around us.
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠聽到更多的所有環繞在我們身邊的美妙聲音。

sentences.english: Many countries have set up man-made satellites to circle the earth.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家已發射了人造衛星環繞地球。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，車輛環繞獨立天使紀念碑行駛。

sentences.english: The man-made water system wanders 7 kilometers long, reaching every corner of the scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒七公里長的人工水系四通八達環繞着整個景區。

sentences.english: Now lets place some secondary shapes, rings around the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 現在放些二級形，環繞管子的圓環。

sentences.english: This strange dream ever around her twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 這怪夢曾經環繞了她二十年。

sentences.english: Surrounded by a jagged mountain ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它被鋸齒形的山脊所環繞。

sentences.english: The paths of bluestone slates zigzag through the woods.
sentences.chinese: 自然曲折的青石板小路環繞林間。

sentences.english: On his arrival, the pontiff circled the park packed stadium in his popemobile.
sentences.chinese: 教皇到達後，乘坐其座駕環繞滿是人羣的體育場。

sentences.english: The Body Mandala is surrounded by crescent-shaped areas, which are the offering grounds.
sentences.chinese: 身城被新月形地區環繞，此爲祭地。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整個套房由帶有海水游泳池的天台環繞。

sentences.english: Admire everyone's beauty freely, and drink in the perfume of Spirit that is all around you.
sentences.chinese: 自在的欣賞每一個人的美，飲下環繞著你的靈性芬芳。

definition: to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
